Title: Ballistae Bits
Description:
Those djaradin might smell like brutes, but their engineering corps must be top notch to keep churning out ballistae strong enough to threaten a dragon!

Northeast of Loamm there's an ongoing scrap between them and some black dragons. There ought to be lots of spare parts scattered around. Or slightly used, moderately on fire ones, anyway!

Haul them all back to Loamm! A little scorching won't stop our top minds from reverse niffeneering them.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Scrybbil in Loamm.
